question: How satisfied are you with your current work environment?
Do you feel your workplace promotes a healthy work-life balance?
How well does your manager support your professional growth?
How comfortable are you approaching your manager with concerns?
Does your manager provide regular and constructive feedback?
How would you rate your overall job performance?
How often do you meet your performance goals?
Do you feel you have opportunities for skill development in your role?
How satisfied are you with the training and development programs offered by the company?
How effectively do you collaborate with your team members?
